description: Check out the best 3D printing apps for Android and iOS. On-the-go 3D printer control, file repositories, and 3D scanning awaits!
title: The Best 3D Printing Apps in 2024 (Android & iOS)

description: With a menu of automated features, the capacity to print 32 kilos of material without manual intervention, and a nice print-speed-to-print-size ratio, the Viio 250 should turn some heads.
title: BigRep Launches Another Large-Scale Hot FDM, the Viio 250

description: The M1 Ultra is capable of laser engraving, die-cutting, pen plotting, and inkjet printing, while the heat press can be used as a handheld, “mini,” or platform unit.
title: xTool Opens Preorders for 4-in-1 M1 Ultra, Announces ‘Smart’ Heat Press
